text: @sardesairajdeep @RahulGandhi There was a BJP MP name I have forgotten and his only agenda was to force COVID-19 tests on Rahul Gandhi.He kept repeating that like Gayatri Mantram.Haven't heard about him for quite some time ,wonder whether he is a +ve case by now ?
